entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
